sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav class="nav">
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 1}">All</button>
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 2}">Active</button>
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 3}">Completed</button>
  </nav>
  <TodoInput class="todo__form"/>
  <TodoList v-if="activeTab === 1" :todos=""/>
</template>
<script>
  import { useStore } from 'vuex';
  import TodoInput from './components/TodoInput.vue';
  import TodoList from './components/TodoList.vue';

  export default {
    components: { TodoInput, TodoList },
    setup() {
      let activeTab = 1
      const store = useStore()
      let activeTodos = store.getters.activeTodos()
      let completedTodos = store.getters.completedTodos()

      return { activeTab }
    }
  }
</script>
<style scoped>
  .todo__form {
    margin-bottom: 50px;
  }
</style>
